statements: DELETE FROM credit_card_disputes WHERE dispute_amount > 1000 AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE membership_level = 'Gold')
DELETE FROM credit_card_disputes WHERE dispute_reason = 'Unauthorized transaction'
DELETE FROM merchants WHERE merchant_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Merchants WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND address LIKE '%California%';
DELETE FROM merchants WHERE merchant_name = 'Example Merchant';
